00001 # Copyright David Faure <faure@kde.org> 2005
00002 # BSD license (see COPYING)
00003 def exists(env):
00004         return true
00005 
00006 def generate(env):
00007 
00008         def get_compiler_version():
00009                 import re, os
00010 
00011                 # TODO check this with other compilers
00012                 # TODO: and convert xlC and KCC code from kdelibs/configure.in.in
00013                 if env['CC'] != 'gcc' and env['CC'] != 'cl':
00014                         return False
00015         
00016                 error_regexp = re.compile('Usage|ERROR|unrecognized option|unknown option|WARNING|missing|###')
00017                 unused_regexp = re.compile('Reading specs|Using built|Configured with|Thread model|Copyright|###')
00018         
00019                 for flag in ['-v', '-V', '--version', '-version', '/help']:
00020                         # should I use context.TryAction here?
00021                         syspf = os.popen( env['CC']+' '+flag+' 2>&1' )
00022                         for line in syspf.read().split( '\n' ):
00023                                 if re.search( error_regexp, line, 'I' ):
00024                                         continue
00025                                 if re.search( unused_regexp, line, 'I' ):
00026                                         continue
00027                                 if len(line):
00028                                         return line
00029 
00030                 return False
00031 
00032         def Check_compiler(context):
00033                 context.Message('Checking for compiler version... ')
00034                 import sys, os
00035 
00036                 compiler_version = get_compiler_version()
00037                 if compiler_version:
00038                         # Quote backslashes, as we are going to make this a string
00039                         compiler_version.replace('\\', '\\\\')
00040 
00041                         env['_CONFIG_H_'].append('compiler')
00042                         dest = open(env.join(env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'config-compiler.h'), 'w')
00043                         dest.write('/* compiler name and version */\n')
00044                         dest.write('#define KDE_COMPILER_VERSION "'+compiler_version+'"\n')
00045                         dest.close();
00046                         context.Result(compiler_version)
00047                 else:
00048                         print 'Compiler not found.'
00049                         context.Result(False)
00050                         env.Exit(1)
00051 
00052                 
00053         from SCons.Options import Options
00054 
00055         optionFile = env['CACHEDIR'] + 'compiler.cache.py'
00056         opts = Options(optionFile)
00057         opts.AddOptions(
00058                 ('COMPILER_ISCONFIGURED', 'If the compiler is already tested for'),
00059                 )
00060         opts.Update(env)
00061         if not env['HELP'] and (env['_CONFIGURE_'] or not env.has_key('COMPILER_ISCONFIGURED')):
00062                 conf = env.Configure(custom_tests =      { 'Check_compiler' : Check_compiler } )
00063 
00064                 conf.Check_compiler()
00065 
00066                 env = conf.Finish()
00067                 env['COMPILER_ISCONFIGURED'] = 1;
00068                 opts.Save(optionFile, env)
